   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(fun_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   25: 	 init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   26: 	 init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   27: 	 good_call/1,bad_apply/1,bad_fun_call/1,badarity/1,
   28: 	 ext_badarity/1,otp_6061/1,external/1,eep37/1]).
   29: 
   30: %% Internal exports.
   31: -export([nothing/0,call_me/1]).
   32: 
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   34: 
   35: suite() ->
   36:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   37:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   38: 
   39: all() -> 
   40:     cases().
   41: 
   42: groups() -> 
   43:     [].
   44: 
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: 
   52: cases() -> 
   53:     [good_call, bad_apply, bad_fun_call, badarity,
   54:      ext_badarity, otp_6061, external, eep37].
   55: 
   56: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   57:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   64:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   65:     true = lists:member(?MODULE, int:interpreted()),
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   69:     ok.
   70: 
   71: good_call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   72:     F = fun() -> ok end,
   73:     ok = F(),
   74:     FF = fun ?MODULE:nothing/0,
   75:     ok = FF(),
   76:     ok.
   77: 
   78: %% Test that the correct EXIT code is returned for all types of bad funs.
   79: bad_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   80:     bad_apply_fc(42, [0]),
   81:     bad_apply_fc(xx, [1]),
   82:     bad_apply_fc({}, [2]),
   83:     bad_apply_fc({1}, [3]),
   84:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3}, [4]),
   85:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3}, [5]),
   86:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3,4}, [6]),
   87:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3,4,5,6}, [7]),
   88:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3,4,5}, [8]),
   89:     bad_apply_badarg({1,2}, [9]),
   90:     ok.
   91: 
   92: bad_apply_fc(Fun, Args) ->
   93:     Res = (catch apply(Fun, Args)),
   94:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
   95:     erlang:yield(),
   96:     case Res of
   97: 	{'EXIT',{{badfun,Fun},_Where}} ->
   98: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
   99: 	Other ->
  100: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
  101: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Other})
  102:     end.
  103: 
  104: bad_apply_badarg(Fun, Args) ->
  105:     Res = (catch apply(Fun, Args)),
  106:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  107:     erlang:yield(),
  108:     case Res of
  109: 	{'EXIT',{{badfun,Fun},_Where}} ->
  110: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
  111: 	Other ->
  112: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
  113: 	    ct:fail({bad_result, Other})
  114:     end.
  115: 
  116: %% Try directly calling bad funs.
  117: bad_fun_call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     bad_call_fc(42),
  119:     bad_call_fc(xx),
  120:     bad_call_fc({}),
  121:     bad_call_fc({1}),
  122:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3}),
  123:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3}),
  124:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3,4}),
  125:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3,4,5,6}),
  126:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3,4,5}),
  127:     bad_call_fc({1,2}),
  128:     ok.
  129: 
  130: bad_call_fc(Fun) ->
  131:     Args = [some,stupid,args],
  132:     Res = (catch Fun(Args)),
  133:     case Res of
  134: 	{'EXIT',{{badfun,Fun},_Where}} ->
  135: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
  136: 	Other ->
  137: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
  138: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Other})
  139:     end.
  140: 
  141: %% Call and apply valid external funs with wrong number of arguments.
  142: 
  143: badarity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  144:     Fun = fun() -> ok end,
  145:     Stupid = {stupid,arguments},
  146:     Args = [some,{stupid,arguments},here],
  147: 
  148:     %% Simple call.
  149: 
  150:     Res = (catch Fun(some, Stupid, here)),
  151:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  152:     erlang:yield(),
  153:     case Res of
  154: 	{'EXIT',{{badarity,{Fun,Args}},[_|_]}} ->
  155: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
  156: 	_ ->
  157: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
  158: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Res})
  159:     end,
  160: 
  161:     %% Apply.
  162: 
  163:     Res2 = (catch apply(Fun, Args)),
  164:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  165:     erlang:yield(),
  166:     case Res2 of
  167: 	{'EXIT',{{badarity,{Fun,Args}},[_|_]}} ->
  168: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res2]);
  169: 	_ ->
  170: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res2]),
  171: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Res2})
  172:     end,
  173:     ok.
  174: 
  175: %% Call and apply valid external funs with wrong number of arguments.
  176: 
  177: ext_badarity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  178:     Fun = fun ?MODULE:nothing/0,
  179:     Stupid = {stupid,arguments},
  180:     Args = [some,{stupid,arguments},here],
  181: 
  182:     %% Simple call.
  183: 
  184:     Res = (catch Fun(some, Stupid, here)),
  185:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  186:     erlang:yield(),
  187:     case Res of
  188: 	{'EXIT',{{badarity,{Fun,Args}},_}} ->
  189: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
  190: 	_ ->
  191: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
  192: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Res})
  193:     end,
  194: 
  195:     %% Apply.
  196: 
  197:     Res2 = (catch apply(Fun, Args)),
  198:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  199:     erlang:yield(),
  200:     case Res2 of
  201: 	{'EXIT',{{badarity,{Fun,Args}},_}} ->
  202: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res2]);
  203: 	_ ->
  204: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res2]),
  205: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Res2})
  206:     end,
  207:     ok.
  208: 
  209: nothing() ->
  210:     ok.
  211: 
  212: %% Test handling of fun expression referring to uninterpreted code.
  213: otp_6061(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  214: 
  215:     OrigFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  216: 
  217:     Self = self(),
  218:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> test_otp_6061(Self) end),
  219: 
  220:     receive
  221: 	working ->
  222: 	    ok;
  223: 	not_working ->
  224: 	    ct:fail(not_working);
  225: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  226: 	    ct:fail({crash, Reason})
  227:     after
  228: 	5000 ->
  229: 	    ct:fail(timeout)
  230:     end,
  231: 
  232:     process_flag(trap_exit, OrigFlag),
  233: 
  234:     ok.
  235: 
  236: test_otp_6061(Starter) ->
  237:     Passes = [2],
  238:     PassesF = [fun() -> Starter ! not_working end,
  239: 	       fun() -> Starter ! working end,
  240: 	       fun() -> Starter ! not_working end],
  241:     lists:foreach(fun(P)->(lists:nth(P,PassesF))() end,Passes).
  242: 
  243: -define(APPLY(M, F, A), (fun(Fun) -> {ok,{a,b}} = Fun({a,b}) end)(fun M:F/A)).
  244: -define(APPLY2(M, F, A),
  245: 	(fun(Map) ->
  246: 		 Id = fun(I) -> I end,
  247: 		 List = [x,y],
  248: 		 List = Map(Id, List),
  249: 		 {type,external} = erlang:fun_info(Map, type)
  250: 	 end)(fun M:F/A)).
  251: 
  252: external(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  253:     Mod = id(?MODULE),
  254:     Func = id(call_me),
  255:     Arity = id(1),
  256: 
  257:     ?APPLY(?MODULE, call_me, 1),
  258:     ?APPLY(?MODULE, call_me, Arity),
  259:     ?APPLY(?MODULE, Func, 1),
  260:     ?APPLY(?MODULE, Func, Arity),
  261:     ?APPLY(Mod, call_me, 1),
  262:     ?APPLY(Mod, call_me, Arity),
  263:     ?APPLY(Mod, Func, 1),
  264:     ?APPLY(Mod, Func, Arity),
  265: 
  266:     ListsMod = id(lists),
  267:     ListsMap = id(map),
  268:     ListsArity = id(2),
  269: 
  270:     ?APPLY2(lists, map, 2),
  271:     ?APPLY2(lists, map, ListsArity),
  272:     ?APPLY2(lists, ListsMap, 2),
  273:     ?APPLY2(lists, ListsMap, ListsArity),
  274:     ?APPLY2(ListsMod, map, 2),
  275:     ?APPLY2(ListsMod, map, ListsArity),
  276:     ?APPLY2(ListsMod, ListsMap, 2),
  277:     ?APPLY2(ListsMod, ListsMap, ListsArity),
  278: 
  279:     ok.
  280: 
  281: call_me(I) ->
  282:     {ok,I}.
  283: 
  284: eep37(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  285:     F = fun Fact(N) when N > 0 -> N * Fact(N - 1); Fact(0) -> 1 end,
  286:     Add = fun _(N) -> N + 1 end,
  287:     UnusedName = fun BlackAdder(N) -> N + 42 end,
  288:     720 = F(6),
  289:     10 = Add(9),
  290:     50 = UnusedName(8),
  291:     [1,1,2,6,24,120] = lists:map(F, lists:seq(0, 5)),
  292:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:map(fun G() -> G() end, [1])),
  293:     {'EXIT',{{badarity,_},_}} = (catch F()),
  294: 
  295:     ok.
  296: 
  297: id(I) ->
  298:     I.
